import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Discovered VMs</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.07/cloud/discovery/vms"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorCloud"}
```



Returns the discovered cloud VM instances.

### cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL command that retrieves all the discovered cloud VM instances:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  'https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/cloud/discovery/vms'
```

only).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"awsVPCID"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AWSVPCID is the ID of the VPC associated with the VM (AWS only).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cluster"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Cluster is the cluster name that is associated with the vm.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"collections"} required={false} schemaName={"string (string)[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Collections is a list of the matched collections.\n","items":{"type":"string","title":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdAt"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"CreatedAt is the time when the instance was launched.\n","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"fqdn"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"FQDN is the host's fully qualified domain name . E.g. \"ip-192-0-2-0.us-east-2.compute.internal\".\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"hasDefender"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"HasDefender indicates that the instance has a defender installed on it.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"hostname"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Hostname is the hostname. E.g. \"ip-192-0-2-0\" or \"custom\".\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"imageID"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ImageID is the ID of the AMI used to launch the instance. OSDistroInfo represents information regarding the OS distribution

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"distro"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Distro is the OS distro name (e.g. ubuntu).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"distroRelease"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"DistroRelease is the OS distro release (e.g. willy).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"fullName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"FullName is the full name of the distro (e.g. Ubuntu 19.10).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"version"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Version is the OS release numeric version (e.g. 19.10).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"provider"} required={false} schemaName={"common.CloudProvider (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`aws,azure,gcp,alibaba,oci,others`]"} schema={{"description":"CloudProvider specifies the cloud provider name","enum":[["aws","azure","gcp","alibaba","oci","others"]],"type":"string","title":"common.CloudProvider"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"region"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Region is the region the VM is located at.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>tags</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Tags are the tags of the VM instance.
